construct.name: AkagoClient
construct.description: The Akago framework client.Creates the handlers and sets them up.

params.name: options
params.description: Options to use for the framework.

props.name: commands
props.description: Collection of all loaded commands.

props.name: aliases
props.description: Collection of all aliases

props.name: events
props.description: Collection of all events.

props.name: cooldowns
props.description: Collection of all cooldowns

props.name: util
props.description: Utility methods.

props.name: ownerID
props.description: Discord ID of the client owner(s).

props.name: token
props.description: Discord bot's token.

methods.name: isOwner
methods.description: Checks if the user is the ownner of this bot.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Logs the Akago Client in and loads events and commands

props.name: name
props.description: Name of the command

props.name: description
props.description: Description of the command.

props.name: aliases
props.description: Aliases of the command.

props.name: category
props.description: Category for the command.

props.name: cooldown
props.description: The command cooldown in seconds.

props.name: ownerOnly
props.description: Whether or not to allow client owner(s) only.

props.name: guildOnly
props.description: Whether or not the commans can only be used in a guild

props.name: nsfw
props.description: Whether the command can only be done in a NSFW channel.

props.name: memberPermissions
props.description: Permissions required by the member to run this command.

props.name: clientPermissions
props.description: Permissions required by the client to run this command.

props.name: client
props.description: The Akago Client.

props.name: filepath
props.description: The file path to the command.

props.name: commandDirectory
props.description: Directory to commands.

props.name: prefix
props.description: Default command prefix(es)

props.name: allowMentionPrefix
props.description: Allows mentioning the bot as a valid prefix.

props.name: blockBots
props.description: Command handler will block message's from bots.

props.name: blockClient
props.description: Command handler will block message's from the client.

props.name: ignorePermissions
props.description: Array of user's IDs that will ignore permission checks.

props.name: ignoreCooldown
props.description: Array of user's IDs that will ignore command cooldowns.

props.name: defaultCooldown
props.description: Default cooldown of commands that don't have their own cooldown. Set to 0 for no default cooldown.

props.name: name
props.description: The event name that will be emitted.

props.name: type
props.description: Whether the event will be on or once.

props.name: emitter
props.description: The emitter of the event.

props.name: client
props.description: The Akago Client.

props.name: filepath
props.description: The file path to the command.

props.name: listenerDirectory
props.description: Directory to listeners.

params.name: name
params.description: Name of the listener wanted to reload.

methods.name: removeDuplicates
methods.description: Removes any duplicate elements from an array.

methods.name: isClass
methods.description: Checks if a file exports a class.

methods.name: capitalize
methods.description: Capitalizes the first character of a string.

typedefs.name: AkagosOptions
typedefs.description: Options used to determine how the framework behaves.

props.name: ownerID
props.description: Discord ID of the client owner(s).

props.name: token
props.description: Discord bot's token.

typedefs.name: CommandOptions
typedefs.description: Options to use for command execution behavior.

props.name: name
props.description: Name of the command

props.name: description
props.description: Description of the command.

props.name: usage
props.description: The usage of the command.

props.name: examples
props.description: Any exmaples of the command.

props.name: aliases
props.description: Aliases of the command.

props.name: category
props.description: Category for the command.

props.name: ownerOnly
props.description: Whether or not to allow client owner(s) only.

props.name: cooldown
props.description: The command cooldown in seconds.

props.name: memberPermissions
props.description: Permissions required by the member to run this command.

props.name: clientPermissions
props.description: Permissions required by the client to run this command.

props.name: guildOnly
props.description: Whether or not the commans can only be used in a guild

props.name: nsfw
props.description: Whether the command can only be done in a NSFW channel.

props.name: commandDirectory
props.description: File path to command directory.

props.name: prefix
props.description: Prefixes for the command handler.

props.name: allowMentionPrefix
props.description: Allows mentioning the bot as a valid prefix.

props.name: blockBots
props.description: Command handler will block message's from bots.

props.name: blockClient
props.description: Command handler will block message's from the client.

props.name: ignorePermissions
props.description: Array of user's IDs that will ignore permission checks.

props.name: ignoreCooldown
props.description: Array of user's IDs that will ignore command cooldowns.

props.name: defaultCooldown
props.description: Default cooldown of commands that don't have their own cooldown. Set to 0 for no default cooldown.

typedefs.name: ListenerOptions
typedefs.description: Options to use for command execution behavior.

props.name: name
props.description: The event name that will be emitted.

props.name: once
props.description: Whether the event will be on or once.

props.name: emitter
props.description: The emitter of the event.

props.name: listenerDirectory
props.description: File path to listener directory.
